title: Flights & Flatbread with Shafer Vineyards
description:
Join us on Tuesday, October 28, from 4–8 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth Street for a remarkable evening featuring the legendary Shafer Vineyards, one of Napa Valley’s most respected and consistently top-rated wineries. Enjoy a curated tasting of Shafer’s acclaimed portfolio alongside a fresh flatbread, all hosted in a relaxed, intimate setting.

Tasting Fee: $45 (Includes flatbread and tasting)

Featured Wines:

• Shafer One Point Five Cabernet Sauvignon 2023 – 96 pts Jeb Dunnuck, 94 pts Robert Parker’s Wine Advocate – Deeply structured and silky, with cassis, graphite, and floral spice leading to a long, velvety finish.

• Shafer Relentless 2021 – 97 pts James Suckling, 95 pts Vinous, 94 pts Jeb Dunnuck – Bold and powerful with layers of dark fruit, peppery spice, and savory richness balanced by fine, elegant tannins.

• Shafer TD-9 Cabernet Sauvignon 2023 – 95 pts James Suckling, 95 pts Jeb Dunnuck – Lush and expressive with black cherry, raspberry, and graphite woven into a beautifully balanced, full-bodied frame.

• Shafer Red Shoulder Ranch Chardonnay 2024 – Vivid and refined with white peach, pear, and citrus blossom over a bright, mineral-driven finish.

Experience the craftsmanship and legacy of Shafer Vineyards, a Napa icon renowned for its precision, power, and elegance.
